subject: Soccer
European Sovereign Debt Crisis (2010- )
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: In much the way Germany rebuilt its economy, the country has devoted its abundant energy and resources to developing soccer talent, resulting in a global powerhouse for years to come.
